sentences.english: Weak green-yellow fluorescence under UV light.
sentences.chinese: 紫外光照射发弱绿黄色荧光。

sentences.english: It has environmentally protection, UV-resistant and-yellowing, and other advantages.
sentences.chinese: 具有环保，耐紫外光和不发黄等级优点。

sentences.english: The design of a new kind of UV or DUV lithography lenses is described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 设计了一种新的紫外或深紫外光刻物镜。

sentences.english: Electromagnetic wave with wavelengths in 4000 Å is called UV.
sentences.chinese: 波长短于4000埃的电磁波则称为紫外光。

sentences.english: Just don't investigate CSI-style with a black light.
sentences.chinese: 只是不要用紫外光灯来进行犯罪现场调查。

sentences.english: The results of electronic microscope scanning of sub-micrometer patterns by far ultraviolet lithography are given.
sentences.chinese: 并给出远紫外光刻亚微米级图形的电镜扫描照片结果。

sentences.english: We know that UV light gets absorbed by glass, so it shouldn't be able to go through the glass.
sentences.chinese: 我们知道紫外光会被玻璃吸收，所以它无法通过玻璃。

sentences.english: Vanillin absorbs UV light at wavelengths of 308 and 278 nnm.
sentences.chinese: 香兰素可吸收波长为308到278纳米的紫外光。

sentences.english: Such displays of ultraviolet light on Earth are referred to as the northern and southern lights.
sentences.chinese: 这种形式的紫外光在地球上被称为北极和南极光。

sentences.english: Yeah. It was UV light that we used.
Thereinto, radiant flax is a very important qualification of ultraviolet source.
sentences.chinese: 其中总辐射通量是紫外光源的一项重要技术指标。

sentences.english: Through a sophisticate UV ray detection system, the authenticity of the banknote paper will be examined.
sentences.chinese: 利用紫外光检查纸的质量，鉴别出伪钞。

sentences.english: Sheer, hellogh-level broad-spectrum UVA/UVB daily sun protection.
sentences.chinese: 透明，高条理的紫外光防备保护。

sentences.english: They may also be able to use infrared or ultraviolet radiation to drive photosynthesis.
sentences.chinese: 他们也可能只用红外光或者紫外光进行光合作用。

sentences.english: The patterned anodic aluminum oxide (AAO) template was fabricated by UV-photolithography.
sentences.chinese: 采用紫外光刻法制得图案化的阳极氧化铝模板。

sentences.english: When the light was switched off, the plastic coating solidified again and appeared as good as new.
sentences.chinese: 当结束紫外光照射后，塑料成分固化，从而完好如初。
